short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ultimate RSS reader. Just like the old Google Reader, only better.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just a simple app that adds a link to The Old Reader to the apps page in Chrome.

For a notifier extension, please take a look at https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/the-old-reader-notifier/flnadglecinohkbmdpeooblldjpaimpo
